001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.ServiceLoader;
008import java.util.stream.Stream;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.RainbowGum;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
016
017/**
018 * RainbowGum SPI. The Rainbow Gum SPI uses the {@link ServiceLoader} with the
019 * registration of <strong>this class</strong> and <em>NOT the <code>non-sealed</code>
020 * subclasses!</em> Read the {@link ServiceLoader} doc to understand how to register a
021 * service loader class. A common option is to use an annotation processor to generate the
022 * <code>META-INF/services</code> registration. There are several libraries that can do
023 * this:
024 * <ul>
025 * <li><a href="https://github.com/jstachio/pistachio#serviceloader-helper">Pistachio
026 * SVC</a></li>
027 * <li><a href="https://avaje.io/spi/">Avaje SPI</a></li>
028 * <li><a href="https://github.com/kohsuke/metainf-services">metainf-services</a></li>
029 * </ul>
030 * However if your application is fully modularized (has a <code>module-info.java</code>)
031 * you will need to use the module-info syntax:
032 * {@snippet : 
033 * 
034 * provides io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider with com.mycompany.SomeService;
035 * 
036 * }
037 */
038@SuppressWarnings("InvalidInlineTag")
039public sealed interface RainbowGumServiceProvider {
040
041        /**
042         * Provides properties.
043         */
044        public non-sealed interface PropertiesProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
045
046                /**
047                 * Provides properties.
048                 * @param registry registry is usually empty here.
049                 * @return list of properties.
050                 */
051                List<LogProperties> provideProperties(ServiceRegistry registry);
052
053        }
054
055        /**
056         * Provides config from registry and properties.
057         */
058        public non-sealed interface ConfigProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
059
060                /**
061                 * Provide config from registry and properties.
062                 * @param registry registry.
063                 * @param properties properties.
064                 * @return config.
065                 */
066                LogConfig provideConfig(ServiceRegistry registry, LogProperties properties);
067
068        }
069
070        /**
071         * Called after {@link LogConfig} has been loaded to do various custom initialization
072         * like registering {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputProvider}s.
073         * <p>
074         * The configurator has the option to return <code>false</code> to indicate a retry
075         * needs to be made. This is a simple way to handle dependency needs of one
076         * configurator needing another to run prior.
077         *
078         * @see LogConfig#outputRegistry()
079         * @see ServiceRegistry
080         */
081        @FunctionalInterface
082        public non-sealed interface Configurator extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
083
084                /**
085                 * Do ad-hoc initialization before RainbowGum is fully loaded.
086                 * @param config config.
087                 * @return <code>true</code> if all dependencies were found.
088                 */
089                boolean configure(LogConfig config);
090
091                /**
092                 * The default amount of passes made to resolve configurators.
093                 */
094                public static int CONFIGURATOR_PASSES = 4;
095
096                /**
097                 * Runs configurators. If a configurator returns false then it will be retried.
098                 * The default of {@value #CONFIGURATOR_PASSES} passes will be tried.
099                 * @param configurators stream of configurators.
100                 * @param config config to use for registration.
101                 * @throws IllegalStateException if there are configurators still returning
102                 * <code>false</code>.
103                 */
104                public static void runConfigurators(Stream<? extends RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators,
105                                LogConfig config) {
106                        runConfigurators(configurators, config, CONFIGURATOR_PASSES);
107                }
108
109                /**
110                 * Runs configurators. If a configurator returns false then it will be retried.
111                 * @param configurators stream of configurators.
112                 * @param config config to use for registration.
113                 * @param passes number of times to retry configurator if it returns
114                 * @throws IllegalStateException if there are configurators still returning
115                 * <code>false</code>.
116                 */
117                public static void runConfigurators(Stream<? extends RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators,
118                                LogConfig config, int passes) {
119                        List<Configurator> unresolved = new ArrayList<>(configurators.toList());
120                        for (int i = 0; i < passes; i++) {
121                                var it = unresolved.iterator();
122                                while (it.hasNext()) {
123                                        var c = it.next();
124                                        if (c.configure(config)) {
125                                                it.remove();
126                                        }
127                                }
128                                if (unresolved.isEmpty()) {
129                                        break;
130                                }
131                        }
132                        if (!unresolved.isEmpty()) {
133                                throw new IllegalStateException("Configurators could not find dependencies (returned false) after "
134                                                + passes + " passes. configurators = " + unresolved);
135                        }
136
137                }
138
139        }
140
141        /**
142         * Implement to create a custom RainbowGum. This is the preferred way to customize
143         * RainbowGum publishers, appenders, and outputs.
144         */
145        public non-sealed interface RainbowGumProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
146
147                /**
148                 * Optionally provides a rainbow gum based on config.
149                 * @param config config loaded.
150                 * @return a Rainbow Gum or not.
151                 */
152                Optional<RainbowGum> provide(LogConfig config);
153
154                /**
155                 * Creates a default rainbow gum from a config.
156                 * @param config config.
157                 * @return Rainbow Gum.
158                 */
159                public static RainbowGum defaults(LogConfig config) {
160                        return RainbowGum.builder(config).build();
161                }
162
163                /**
164                 * If there are multiple rainbow gum providers found the higher priority ones are
165                 * tried first ({@link #provide(LogConfig)}). The default is {@code 0}.
166                 * <p>
167                 * This feature allows custom rainbow gums for different environments like a
168                 * testing version that lives in its own jar that is in Maven scope test. If its
169                 * priority is higher and {@link #provide(LogConfig)} returns a non-empty optional
170                 * then it will be used instead of than the production Rainbow Gum.
171                 * @return priority order where higher number means it will be tried earlier.
172                 */
173                default int priority() {
174                        return 0;
175                }
176
177        }
178
179        /**
180         * Finds service providers based on type.
181         * @param <T> provider interface type.
182         * @param loader service loader to use.
183         * @param providerType provider class.
184         * @return stream containing only provider of the given type.
185         */
186        public static <T extends RainbowGumServiceProvider> Stream<T> findProviders(
187                        ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader, Class<T> providerType) {
188                return loader.stream().flatMap(p -> {
189                        if (providerType.isAssignableFrom(p.type())) {
190                                var s = providerType.cast(p.get());
191                                return Stream.of(s);
192                        }
193                        return Stream.empty();
194                });
195        }
196
197        /**
198         * Creates config from service loader.
199         * @param loader service loader.
200         * @return config.
201         */
202        public static LogConfig provideConfig(ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader) {
203                return LogConfig.builder().serviceLoader(loader).build();
204        }
205
206        /**
207         * Will load all RainbowGum SPI to create a RainbowGum powered from the ServiceLoader.
208         * @return Rainbow Gum.
209         */
210        public static RainbowGum provide() {
211                ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class);
212                var config = provideConfig(loader);
213                @Nullable
214                RainbowGum gum = findProviders(loader, RainbowGumProvider.class)
215                        .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(RainbowGumProvider::priority).reversed())
216                        .flatMap(s -> s.provide(config).stream())
217                        .findFirst()
218                        .orElse(null);
219
220                if (gum == null) {
221                        gum = RainbowGum.builder(config).build();
222                }
223                return gum;
224        }
225
226}
